title: In the beginning of the glorious deeds

sources.title: In the beginning of the glorious deeds
sources.description: The Russian name is "V nachale slavnykh del". This film is the continuation of "Youth of Peter the Great" Director: Sergey Gerasimov Cast: Dmitri Zolotukhin, Tamara Makarova, Natalya Bondarchuk, Nikolay Yeryomenko (jr.), Oleg Strizhenov, Vadim Spiridonov...
